Room.Name: Rosecrest/Eidenhoft/Waterfront Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the major intersection of Rosecrest, Eidenhoft and Waterfront.
Room.LongDescription: This intersection brings together Rosecrest Street, which runs parallel to the City Wall on the west, Eidenhoft Boulevard, which runs northeast from here towards the Memorial Fountain and the center of town, and Waterfront Way, a more rural path which heads towards the farms and grainery after it passes the shopping centers to the east. This intersection is not quite as busy as others because it runs along the west City Wall. It is however patroled regularly by the city guards.
